title: OBIEE Performance Analytics Platform
description: Led development of Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition (OBIEE) performance analytics platform for pharmaceutical clients, handling prescriber and drug distribution data analytics.
highlights: Built core analytics product on OBIEE 11g for pharmaceutical clients
Handled Prescriber, Drug Distribution Data (DDD), and Payer analytics
Designed and implemented STAR and SNOWFLAKE schema data warehouse models
Delivered analytics solutions to major pharmaceutical and manufacturing clients
